company.name: Razorpay
company.description: India's leading payment gateway solution that enables businesses to accept, process and disburse payments.

faqs.question: What does Razorpay do?
faqs.answer: Razorpay provides a complete payment solution for businesses to accept online payments, automate payouts, and manage finances.  We support credit/debit cards, netbanking, UPI, and 100+ payment methods.

faqs.question: Who is this for?
faqs.answer: Razorpay is designed for businesses of all sizes - from startups to large enterprises. We serve e-commerce, SaaS, education, logistics, and various other sectors.

faqs.question: Do you have a free tier?
faqs.answer: Yes!  We offer a free account to get started. You only pay a small transaction fee (2% + GST) when you process payments.  No setup fees or annual maintenance charges.

faqs.question: What are your pricing plans?
faqs.answer: Our standard pricing is 2% + GST per transaction. For high-volume businesses, we offer custom enterprise pricing with lower rates. No hidden charges or setup fees.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you support?
faqs.answer: We support 100+ payment methods including credit/debit cards, netbanking, UPI, wallets, EMI, and international cards. We're constantly adding new payment options.
